title: Embroidered Slippers with Central Floral Motif in Metallic Thread
content:
accession_no_csv: 2016-00711

  Image: 

  object_work_type: slippers (shoes)

  title_text: Embroidered Slippers with Central Floral Motif in Metallic Thread

  creation_place_original_location: Indonesia Straits Settlements

  shape: irregular

  techniques_name: sewing (needleworking technique)

  object_colour: multicolored

  physical_appearance: This is a pair of square-toe slippers. It is couched with metallic threads to create a floral background. There is also an embroided floral motif in the centre
 surrounded by a bordered pattern.

  subject_terms_1: flowers (motifs) Peranakan embroidery (visual works) footwear

  subject_terms_2: Motifs Embroidery Peranakan (Asian people) Women\u0027s shoes

  subject_terms_3: Peranakan costumes

  sgcool_label_text: This pair of square-toe slippers is couched with metallic threads to create a floral background. Metallic thread is also used to embroider the raised floral motif in the centre and border patterns. Such shoes were worn in the early 1900s but quickly fell out of favour in the Straits Settlements. It is part of a donation which contains a mixture of garments worn by Peranakan men and women.
